app_name: Cookingdom for Android - Free App Download
about_section: Cookingdom is a simulation game developed by ABI Games Studio. The APK has been available since February 2025 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 6.1 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 4.67 out of 5 stars, based on 98 thousand ratings. The last update of the app was on June 6, 2025 . Cookingdom has a content rating "Everyone" . Cookingdom has an APK download size of 769.99 MB and the latest version available is 1.0.40 . Designed for Android version 6.0+ . Cookingdom is FREE to download.
app_description:
Welcome to Cookingdom, an ultimate chill & cozy game that makes cooking as relaxing as a satisfying Sunday morning. This is all about slowing down, having fun, and creating delicious dishes step by step. You’ll go from chopping potatoes to plating masterpieces, all while soaking in those soothing chill vibes. Let's explore the rich flavors of world cuisine with Cookingdom’s recipe book! 🌍✨ Who knows? You might just find a dish from your own country waiting for you inside.🥗🍱
🥄 Step-by-Step Cooking Fun:
Each recipe is broken into small, satisfying mini-games that let you focus on one step at a time:
Chop & Dice: Gently slice veggies, herbs, or even fancy garnishes. The soft sounds of your knife hitting the cutting board? Chef’s kiss! 👌
Mix & Stir: Combine ingredients with satisfying swirls as batter or soup comes together before your eyes. Watch the colors blend—it’s like food ASMR.
Cook to Perfection: Flip pancakes, sauté veggies, or grill meats just right. Mistime it? No problem—there’s always room for a laugh and another try!
Plating Masterpieces: Carefully arrange your dishes to look as tasty as they are. Add a sprinkle of herbs or drizzle a sauce for that perfect finishing touch.
🥘 Dishes to Warm Your Soul
From comforting classics to creative fusion dishes, there’s always something delicious to make:
A steaming bowl of miso ramen with all the toppings 🍜
Stacks of fluffy pancakes drizzled with syrup 🍮
A colorful charcuterie board full of cute snacks 🧀
Warm chocolate lava cake oozing with goodness 🍫
With each completed dish, you’ll unlock more recipes, ingredients, and fun tools to play with. 🍴🍣🍲
🎨 Make Your Kitchen a Cozy Haven
Cooking feels better in a space you love, so customize your kitchen to match your vibes:
Add cozy touches like twinkling fairy lights, potted plants, or rustic wooden shelves.
Upgrade your tools, from colorful cutting boards to adorable whisks shaped like cats.
Dress your chef in comfy aprons, fuzzy slippers, or even themed outfits for each recipe! 🍷
🍲 Why You’ll Love Cookingdom? 
🌸 It's Your Cozy Culinary Escape: No stress, no timers, just the relaxing joy of creating beautiful food.
🌸 Sounds You Can Feel: The crunch of slicing veggies, the gentle simmer of soup, the tap-tap-tap of seasoning… it’s like a warm blanket for your ears.
🌸 Your Kitchen, Your Style: Decorate your space with cute plants, fairy lights, or even a cat clock that says “meow” when you finish a dish.
🌸 Adorable Chef Fits: Rock a bunny apron, fuzzy slippers, or a sweater that screams “I make soup and it’s amazing.”
🌸 Relaxing Vibes for Every Playthrough: With soft lo-fi beats, soothing sound effects, and dreamy visuals, the game feels like wrapping yourself in a warm blanket while sipping hot cocoa. Take your time, enjoy the journey, and let your inner chef shine.
🌸 Satisfying mixture of puzzle, casual & simulation game with gorgeously cute arts and emotional animations.
🌟 Ready to Cookingdom? 🍤🍗🍕🍔
Whether you’re winding down after a long day or just want to chill with some virtual pancakes, Cookingdom is here for you. Take your time, enjoy every step, and let the cozy vibes do the rest.
Cookingdom is the ultimate cozy cooking escape. Whether you’re here to unwind, get inspired, or simply enjoy making food step-by-step, you’ll leave every session feeling refreshed and satisfied. So grab your spatula—it’s time to cook up some chill vibes! 🍳
So, what are you waiting for? Download now and turn your screen into the cutest little kitchen where cooking made cozy stories. It’s time to cook, relax, and chill. 💖
Recent changes:
- Add more recipes
- Improve pizza restaurant mode
